value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Look at this map... This area in the
north here... We should start there.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|The forest along our borders?
Why there?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I've seen a strange silhouette headed
in that direction.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Strange? In what way?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|It had wings like a bat...and appeared
to be flying.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Another race of mortals?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Since the forest is on the border,
we should avoid crossing into each
other's territory if we can...$k$pTo avoid any diplomatic
misunderstandings among
the people...$k$pThis way we should be able to
search together while avoiding
any unnecessary violence.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Understood. We will search the
Askran side of the border.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|These Emblian soldiers look different
than Princess Veronica's troops.
Are there other Emblian forces?$k$p$Sbs1000|
